content.question: Often a manufacturing company will attempt to merge with another company that possesses forward or backward links in the supply or production process. Which of the following terms best describes this type of strategy?

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

topic.text: 7.7: Changes as a Result of the World Economy

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
